metadata.summary: I'm sorry, but it seems like there is no text provided for me to summarize. If you could provide the text, I would be happy to help summarize it for you.

key_points: Implementing best practices in project management

metadata.summary: Free trial for Microsoft 365 Business Basic ends on 17 May 2025, converting to a paid subscription. Recurring billing will start then. You can cancel or modify subscription before 16 May 2025. Price is $0.00 for 25 licenses.

key_points: Free trial converting to a paid subscription on 17 May 2025
Recurring billing will start on the conversion date
Price of subscription is $0.00 USD for 25 licenses
Deadline to turn off recurring billing or cancel subscription: 16 May 2025
action_items: Turn off recurring billing or cancel subscription before 16 May 2025
Make changes in the Microsoft 365 admin centre
Consider updating payment method, adding licenses, or extending trial subscription

metadata.summary: Azure subscription deleted on 04 May 2025. Start new pay-as-you-go subscription anytime. Contact support for help. Subscription ID: 84368632-0cd7-45ec-9237-17e7d6976e47.

key_points: Users can begin a new Azure subscription anytime they want
Instructions to start using Azure again
action_items: Sign up for a new pay-as-you-go Azure subscription
Submit a support ticket if additional help is needed
